gui.xaero_requires_reload: 需要加载世界才能生效！ Lower
gui.xaero_biome_colors: 以原版模式显示生物群系
gui.xaero_delete_map_msg1: 你确定要删除所选地图吗？
gui.xaero_delete_map_msg2: 仅备份最近删除的地图。
gui.xaero_map_selection_box:
手动 - 每次切换世界或维度时，都会要求您选择并确认世界地图。 
 
 世界生成 - 根据游戏客户端已知的世界出生点自动选择并确认世界地图。如果服务器将原版指南针用于自定义功能，则可能会中断。 
 
 独立 - 每个维度都有一个自动确认的独立世界地图。对于具有单一世界的简单服务器很有用。 
 
 服务器 - 在服务器上安装 Xaeros 世界地图模组后可使用此自动模式
gui.xaero_wm_box_ignore_heightmaps: 一些服务器自定义了高度图，这可能导致地图渲染不正确。这种情况有时也会发生在经过大量修改的单人游戏中。此选项以牺牲一些性能为代价决绝此类问题。除非需要，否则不要使用。更改此选项后需重新进入世界！
gui.xaero_wm_error_loading_properties: 加载服务器世界地图属性时出错。请重试。
gui.xaero_mw_server_box: 地图选择由服务器自动控制。您可以在 XaeroWorldMap 文件夹（游戏目录中）找到服务器特定配置文件（server_config.txt），设置 "ignoreServerLevelId" 选项以关闭此功能。
gui.xaero_box_controls:
控制 
 
 单击并拖动以滚动地图。 
 滚动鼠标滚轮进行缩放（CTRL 定位缩放） 
 右键单击地图打开快捷方式菜单。 
 一些按钮的提示信息中显示了其额外的快捷键。 
 
 右键地图元素（如航点）以打开选项。 
 %1$s单击此处编辑快捷键。
gui.xaero_box_controls_minimap:
§2%s§r 新建航点。 
 §2%s§r 新建临时航点 
 §2%s§r 切换航点集。 
 §2%s§r 渲染所有航点集。 
 §2%s§r 打开完整的航点菜单。
gui.xaero_box_controls_pac: §2%s§r to open the Parties and Claims menu.
gui.xaero_box_export: 将地图导出为 PNG 文件。
gui.xaero_export_confirm_1: 要将地图导出为 PNG 文件吗？
gui.xaero_export_confirm_2: 在此过程中游戏将会暂时冻结。
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_minimap_required: The waypoint feature requires the Xaero's Minimap mod!
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_disabled: Waypoints are disabled in the world map settings!
gui.xaero_no_world_map_item_message: The mod is configured to require the following item in your hotbar or equipped:
gui.xaero_current_map_locked1: The currently selected map is used by another process (Minecraft client).
gui.xaero_current_map_locked2: Please select a different map of this server (bottom left icon).
gui.xaero_wm_box_detect_ambiguous_y: A single pixel on the map can contain multiple transparent layers and an opaque block under them. In older non-cache map data files, only the Y level (height) of the opaque block is stored in such cases, which often makes it unsafe to blindly teleport to the stored Y coordinate. When this setting is ON, the mod treats such map pixels as it would undiscovered chunks. It defaults to 2D waypoints and disables direct teleportation to such pixels. Disable this at your own risk!
gui.xaero_box_closing_menu_when_hopping: Closing the menu when hopping to a waypoint (left-clicking in the menu)
gui.xaero_box_not_closing_menu_when_hopp: Not closing the menu when hopping to a waypoint (left-clicking in the menu)
gui.xaero_wm_box_adjust_height_for_carpe: Subtract 1 from the height value for short carpetlike blocks, e.g. carpet, 1-layer snow, lilypad etc. This prevents such blocks from causing harsh shading on the map like a full block. Waypoints and teleportation over these blocks should make more sense too.
gui.xaero_box_only_current_map_waypoints: Displaying only the waypoints bound to the current world map, even if another waypoint sub-world is selected for the minimap using the full waypoint menu.
gui.xaero_box_waypoints_selected_by_mini: Displaying waypoints from the same waypoint sub-world as you are viewing in game and on the minimap. The sub-world can be switched in the full waypoint menu.
gui.xaero_wm_box_arrow_color: Color of the arrow that indicates the position and the rotation of the player.
gui.xaero_box_minimap_radar: %s Minimap entity radar is displayed (requires Xaero's Minimap)
gui.xaero_box_no_minimap_radar: %s Minimap entity radar is not displayed
gui.xaero_wm_toggle_minimap_radar: Toggle Minimap Radar On World Map
gui.xaero_box_players_pac_required: The party player menu feature requires the Open Parties and Claims mod!
gui.xaero_box_claims_pac_required: The chunk claim feature requires the Open Parties and Claims mod!
gui.xaero_wm_box_pac_player_teleport_com: The chat command used on this world/server to teleport you to other players on the map when Open Parties and Claims is installed.
gui.xaero_wm_box_pac_claims: Display chunk claims from the Open Parties and Claims mod as a colored overlay.
gui.xaero_wm_box_pac_claims_opacity: The opacity of the chunk claims overlay. Chunk claims require the Open Parties and Claims mod.
